info.description: This is a Billingo API v3 documentation. Our API based on REST software architectural style. API has resource-oriented URLs, accepts JSON-encoded request bodies and returns JSON-encoded responses. To use this API you have to generate a new API key on our [site](https://app.billingo.hu/api-key). After that, you can test your API key on this page.
info.title: Billingo API v3

externalDocs.description: Find out more information about Billingo API v3 usage.
